StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_PatientCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(distinct(idcard)) from pt_pregnantinfo

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_PregnantRecordCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(1) from pt_pregnantinfo

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_CreateBookAge_lt20_Count
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(1) from pt_pregnantinfo where createtime is not null and birthday is not null and DATEPART(year,createtime)-DATEPART(year,birthday)<20

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_CreateBookAge_20_29_Count
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(1) from pt_pregnantinfo where createtime is not null and birthday is not null and DATEPART(year,createtime)-DATEPART(year,birthday)>=20 and DATEPART(year,createtime)-DATEPART(year,birthday) <29

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_CreateBookAge_30_34_Count
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(1) from pt_pregnantinfo where createtime is not null and birthday is not null and DATEPART(year,createtime)-DATEPART(year,birthday)>=30 and DATEPART(year,createtime)-DATEPART(year,birthday) <34

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_CreateBookAge_35_39_Count
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(1) from pt_pregnantinfo where createtime is not null and birthday is not null and DATEPART(year,createtime)-DATEPART(year,birthday)>=35 and DATEPART(year,createtime)-DATEPART(year,birthday) <39

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_CreateBookAge_40_44_Count
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(1) from pt_pregnantinfo where createtime is not null and birthday is not null and DATEPART(year,createtime)-DATEPART(year,birthday)>=40 and DATEPART(year,createtime)-DATEPART(year,birthday) <44

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_CreateBookAge_gt_44_Count
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(1) from pt_pregnantinfo where createtime is not null and birthday is not null and DATEPART(year,createtime)-DATEPART(year,birthday) >44

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_MHC_VisitRecordCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(1) from PT_MHC_VisitRecord

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_MHC_VisitRecord_Diagnosis
StatisticsEntity.SQL:
-- 新增时间 设置默认值 CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DiagnosisFrequency]( [Id][bigint] IDENTITY(1, 2) NOT NULL, [db_createtime] [datetime] DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
[Name] [varchar](100) NULL, -- 类型名称 [Num] [bigint] NULL, -- 出现频次 [Category] [tinyint] NULL, -- 分类 CONSTRAINT[PK_DiagnosisFrequency] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH(PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON) ON[PRIMARY] ) ON[PRIMARY]
-- 校验 select 1

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_MHC_VisitRecord_Diagnosis
PT_MHC_VisitRecord_Diagnosis
StatisticsEntity.SQL: insert into DiagnosisFrequency(Name,Num,Category) select t.name,t.num,@Category as Category from (SELECT secondarydiagnosis as name,count(1) as num FROM [dbo].PT_MHC_VisitRecord group by secondarydiagnosis having secondarydiagnosis is not null and secondarydiagnosis != '' and CHARINDEX(',',secondarydiagnosis)=0 and CHARINDEX('、',secondarydiagnosis)=0 and CHARINDEX('；',secondarydiagnosis)=0) as t where t.Num>5 select 1;

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_MHC_VisitRecordCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(1) from PT_MHC_VisitRecord

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_MHC_VisitRecordCount_Monthly
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(1) from PT_MHC_VisitRecord where DATEPART(year,visitdate) = @Year and DATEPART(month,visitdate) = @Month

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_RiskLevel_Green_Count
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(distinct(pi.id)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_MHC_HighRiskReason hrr on pi.id = hrr.PregnantInfoId where hrr.id is null

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_RiskLevel_Yellow_Count
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(distinct(pi.id)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_MHC_HighRiskReason hrr on pi.id = hrr.PregnantInfoId where hrr.HighRiskLevel = 'A'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_RiskLevel_Orange_Count
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(distinct(pi.id)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_MHC_HighRiskReason hrr on pi.id = hrr.PregnantInfoId where hrr.HighRiskLevel = 'B'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_RiskLevel_Red_Count
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(distinct(pi.id)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_MHC_HighRiskReason hrr on pi.id = hrr.PregnantInfoId where hrr.HighRiskLevel = 'C'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_RiskLevel_Violet_Count
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(distinct(pi.id)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_MHC_HighRiskReason hrr on pi.id = hrr.PregnantInfoId where hrr.HighRiskLevel = 'Z'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_ChildCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(1) from PT_CDH_NeonateRecord

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_ChildRecordCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(1) from PT_CDH_NeonateRecord

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_BoyCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(1) from PT_CDH_NeonateRecord a where xingbiemc ='男性'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_GirlCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(1) from PT_CDH_NeonateRecord a where xingbiemc ='女性'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_ChildRecordCount_Monthly
StatisticsEntity.Discription: 新生儿档案总数月周期
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(1) from PT_CDH_NeonateRecord nr where DATEPART(year,CreateTime) = @Year and DATEPART(month,CreateTime) = @Month

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_MotherCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_DeliveryRecord dr on pi.idcard = dr.shenfenzjhm and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,dr.fenmianrqsj))<300 where dr.id is null

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_PregnantCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_DeliveryRecord dr on pi.idcard = dr.shenfenzjhm and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,dr.fenmianrqsj))<300 where dr.id is not null

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_PregnancyOutcomeAliveCount
StatisticsEntity.Discription: 分娩结局`存活`母亲总数 @fenmianjjmc
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_DeliveryRecord dr on pi.idcard = dr.shenfenzjhm and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,dr.fenmianrqsj))<300 where dr.id is not null and dr.fenmianjjmc ='存活'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_PregnancyOutcomeStillBirthCount
StatisticsEntity.Discription: 分娩结局`死胎`母亲总数 @fenmianjjmc
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_DeliveryRecord dr on pi.idcard = dr.shenfenzjhm and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,dr.fenmianrqsj))<300 where dr.id is not null and dr.fenmianjjmc ='死胎'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_PregnancyOutcomeDeadBirthCount
StatisticsEntity.Discription: 分娩结局`死产`母亲总数 @fenmianjjmc
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_DeliveryRecord dr on pi.idcard = dr.shenfenzjhm and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,dr.fenmianrqsj))<300 where dr.id is not null and dr.fenmianjjmc ='死产'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_MotherOutcomeDeadBirthCount
StatisticsEntity.Discription: 母亲结局`产时死亡`母亲总数 @chanfujjmc
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_DeliveryRecord dr on pi.idcard = dr.shenfenzjhm and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,dr.fenmianrqsj))<300 where dr.id is not null and dr.chanfujjmc ='产时死亡'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_MotherOutcomeAliveCount
StatisticsEntity.Discription: 母亲结局`存活`母亲总数 @chanfujjmc
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_DeliveryRecord dr on pi.idcard = dr.shenfenzjhm and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,dr.fenmianrqsj))<300 where dr.id is not null and dr.chanfujjmc ='存活'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_Boy_DeliveryWeekCount_lt28
StatisticsEntity.Discription: 男孩分娩孕周 小于28周
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_NeonateRecord nr on pi.idcard = nr.muqinsfzjhm and nr.xingbiemc ='男性' and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))<300 and (280 + datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))/7 < 28 where nr.id is not null

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_Boy_DeliveryWeekCount_28_37
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_NeonateRecord nr on pi.idcard = nr.muqinsfzjhm and nr.xingbiemc ='男性' and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))<300 and (280 + datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))/7 >= 28 and (280 + datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))/7 < 37 where nr.id is not null

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_Boy_DeliveryWeekCount_37_41
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_NeonateRecord nr on pi.idcard = nr.muqinsfzjhm and nr.xingbiemc ='男性' and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))<300 and (280 + datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))/7 >= 37 and (280 + datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))/7 < 42 where nr.id is not null

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_Boy_DeliveryWeekCount_gt41
StatisticsEntity.Discription: 男孩分娩孕周 大于41周
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_NeonateRecord nr on pi.idcard = nr.muqinsfzjhm and nr.xingbiemc ='男性' and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))<300 and (280 + datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))/7 > 41 where nr.id is not null

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_Girl_DeliveryWeekCount_lt28
StatisticsEntity.Discription: 女孩分娩孕周 小于28周
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_NeonateRecord nr on pi.idcard = nr.muqinsfzjhm and nr.xingbiemc ='女性' and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))<300 and (280 + datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))/7 < 28 where nr.id is not null

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_Girl_DeliveryWeekCount_28_37
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_NeonateRecord nr on pi.idcard = nr.muqinsfzjhm and nr.xingbiemc ='女性' and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))<300 and (280 + datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))/7 >= 28 and (280 + datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))/7 < 37 where nr.id is not null

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_Girl_DeliveryWeekCount_37_41
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_NeonateRecord nr on pi.idcard = nr.muqinsfzjhm and nr.xingbiemc ='女性' and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))<300 and (280 + datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))/7 >= 37 and (280 + datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))/7 < 42

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_Girl_DeliveryWeekCount_gt41
StatisticsEntity.Discription: 女孩分娩孕周 大于41周
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_NeonateRecord nr on pi.idcard = nr.muqinsfzjhm and nr.xingbiemc ='女性' and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))<300 and (280 + datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,nr.fenmianrqsj))/7 < 28 where nr.id is not null

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_DeliveryMode_ForcepsCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_DeliveryRecord dr on pi.idcard = dr.shenfenzjhm and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,dr.fenmianrqsj))<300 where dr.id is not null and dr.fenmianfsmc ='产钳助产'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_DeliveryMode_DestroyCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_DeliveryRecord dr on pi.idcard = dr.shenfenzjhm and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,dr.fenmianrqsj))<300 where dr.id is not null and dr.fenmianfsmc ='毁胎术'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_DeliveryMode_CesareanCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_DeliveryRecord dr on pi.idcard = dr.shenfenzjhm and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,dr.fenmianrqsj))<300 where dr.id is not null and dr.fenmianfsmc ='剖宫产'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_DeliveryMode_OtherCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_DeliveryRecord dr on pi.idcard = dr.shenfenzjhm and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,dr.fenmianrqsj))<300 where dr.id is not null and (dr.fenmianfsmc ='其他' or dr.fenmianfsmc ='其它')

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_DeliveryMode_ExtractionCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_DeliveryRecord dr on pi.idcard = dr.shenfenzjhm and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,dr.fenmianrqsj))<300 where dr.id is not null and dr.fenmianfsmc ='胎头吸引'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_DeliveryMode_BreechAssistCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_DeliveryRecord dr on pi.idcard = dr.shenfenzjhm and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,dr.fenmianrqsj))<300 where dr.id is not null and dr.fenmianfsmc ='臀位助产'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_DeliveryMode_VaginalCount
StatisticsEntity.Discription: 分娩方式`阴道自然分娩` @fenmianfsmc
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_DeliveryRecord dr on pi.idcard = dr.shenfenzjhm and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,dr.fenmianrqsj))<300 where dr.id is not null and dr.fenmianfsmc ='阴道自然分娩'

StatisticsEntity.Name: PT_DeliveryMode_InducedCount
StatisticsEntity.SQL: select count(DISTINCT(pi.idcard)) from PT_PregnantInfo pi left join PT_CDH_DeliveryRecord dr on pi.idcard = dr.shenfenzjhm and abs(datediff(day,pi.dateofprenatal,dr.fenmianrqsj))<300 where dr.id is not null and dr.fenmianfsmc ='治疗性引产'
